name: FlutterTest
description: Executes all tests for a Flutter project.
helpMarkdown: For more information, take a look at the Flutter [documentation](https://flutter.io)
author: md84419

inputs.name: projectDirectory
inputs.label: Path to the project folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the project folder (which contains the `pubspec.yaml`)

inputs.name: testName
inputs.label: Test name
inputs.helpMarkDown: A regular expression matching substrings of the names of tests to run.

inputs.name: testPlainName
inputs.label: Test plain name
inputs.helpMarkDown: A plain-text substring of the names of tests to run.

inputs.name: updateGoldens
inputs.label: Update goldens
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether matchesGoldenFile() calls within your test methods should update the golden files rather than test for an existing match.

inputs.name: generateCodeCoverageReport
inputs.label: Generate code coverage report
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether flutter should generate a code coverage report based on tests in project. File is generated at project source directory in coverage/lcov.info.

inputs.name: concurrency
inputs.label: Concurrency
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of concurrent test processes to run. (defaults to '6')
